title: Vegan's Prague
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Macrobiotic, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Asian, Bakery, European, Czech
description: An all-vegan restaurant in the heart of Prague, near Prague Castle, opened early 2016. Creates home-style Czech and international cuisine. Relax on the romantic terrace with a beautiful view. The restaurant is in an old building from 16th Century.
